评论详情: I’ll say that walking on flat, dry ground is okay. However, if your feet get wet they slip around too much. Even dry, there is no rigid structure to this sandal, your feet slide all over the place; especially when going up or down slopes. So you absolutely can’t go hiking. You cannot tighten the backstrap without having a lot of excess strap dangling, and you cannot tighten the front portion without squeezing your toes together (the opposite concept of barefoot footwear). It’s a pretty terrible design. I’m glad I bought these at a discounted price, but even then paid too much.
We bought them for our travels in India. They are very durable. No complaints.
These are decent sandles, however once they get wet you actually slip inside of them. The sole has traction but not where your foot rests so they’re a little weird feeling when wet.
These are super basic, but have held up well with daily use through the spring and summer. They’re adjustable and the traction is good. Good for building foot arch muscles!
Love it

They are quite annoying to put on due to repeated twisting of the straps. They are hard to hike in unless you keep to clean and dry trails. I wore them in Kauai and was fairly uncomfortable. Disappointed that I bought them.

I bought these because they are lightweight and I was traveling with only a small backpack in the summer. They fit in the outer side water bottle compartment and don’t add a lot of bulk or weight. They are also pretty comfortable if you are looking for a zero drop minimal sandal with just a bit more thickness for all day walking and rocky beech activity. They seem pretty durable so far I’m happy with my purchase.

评论概述: This is the third pair I have bought over 7 years of wearing them.
评论详情: These things are minimal, but long lasting.  I usually where them all summer long, and have to replace them about every two years.  Very comfortable for some like me who has wide feet.
Better than I thought! Very confortable and It fits well! I use shoes 10.5 to 11 USA sizes with one finger gap at the toes and the size 11 feets me perfectly!

评论概述: Disappointed with the straps and the overall quality
评论详情: Straps break.  I've only had them for 3 months.  They were pretty good otherwise.

评论概述: worth it for the experience, needs major update.
评论详情: cons - the straps are rough for putting on. most difficult shoes i’ve worn. please adopt the teva system. i had a pair of too big tevas that never had any issue swimming, but they don’t have barefoot! -awful for swimming, the toes will immediately slip out. -can’t sit in cross cross position comfortably. these are popular among conscious folks/yogis. i sit in lotus/criss cross every day and the strap system puts the fastener in the worst possible spot for seating comfort.  look, i get it, light weight is great. but i’d so much rather add 3 extra ounces for functionality than be as minimal as possible. i’m an actual minimalist! these are the only shoes i own! i don’t need them to pack up just a tiny bit better lol  pros- the barefoot experience has changed my life drastically. i was an actual barefoot walker for a long time and have had numerous ouch’s as expected. these looks great and feel great for any reasonable daily use outdoors. it’s not great on unnatural surfaces (concrete etc) for long periods but it does get easier. i try to avoid these surfaces anyways. walk in the grass medians etc.

I needed a comfortable shoe for use around water on a trip and these were perfect.  They are so thin and light I was able easily fit them into my carry on bag.  I find myself wearing them everywhere now as they are very comfortable for everyday use.

评论概述: Xero Barefoot Z-Trail sandals are very comfortable.
评论详情: I wear the Z-Trail sandals every day around my home and yard. They are amazingly comfortable.  I trail run 4 to 5 days a week and wear Z-Trail sandals if it is raining or very wet.  I wear a size 11 running shoe, but I purchase size 10 Z-Trail sandal. I like less material extended beyond my toes when trail running.  I hope XEROSHOES will be successful and remain in business for many years to come. I plan to purchase these sandals in the future.

These are the sandals I’ve been looking for. Comfy, and can actually adventure in them (will re-review after a few dozen miles, but I could tell they’ll be great as soon as I got them on). Definitely scan the qr code to get info in the best fit. Bonus, I don’t feel like I like I’m wearing a jimmy buffet fan disguise (which is a hard sandal to find after age 35) Update: handled a 30+ mile trip very well.

评论概述: God slides all over the place when wet
评论详情: Completely unusable as a sandal when crossing creeks or in the rain Fft Can’t believe it has zero traction What a horrible oversight from a fitness company Are these indoor slippers or what

评论概述: After one 3 hour walk the front of the sole is gone.
评论详情: I liked the comfort of the sandal but durability as a "Hiking Sandal" never lived up to the sale.
I wear these now instead of tennis shoes when walking. Very comfortable. I can't believe they are flat and I feel better.

These sandals were purchased at the end of April. I started wearing them in early June and the straps are already fraying in several places with normal use. I don't expect another month to go by before one of the straps breaks. Save your money and look elsewhere.

The concept is good and this is one of the only sandals that haven't caused blisters on my feet from wearing them all day. However, the materials fall apart quickly, like within several weeks they look several years old. I would be disappointed if these were $20 sandals, let alone $80.
These are my new favorite sandals. I put a lot of miles on them walking around Toronto for a few days. The only thing that could make these better is if the foot bed was a little grippier in the wet.

I'm a 10.5 men's 95% of the time.  The 10 was too small (big toe hung a bit off front edge and I was worried about stubbing it), but the heel fit great.  The 11 gave me the length I needed, but now my heel "swims" in it a bit.  Regardless of how I manipulate straps, my left heel slides out and rubs real bad against the back outside part where the strap connects to the sole.I wish they made these in half-sizes, they are so close to being awesome, and I'm a 10.5 in almost everything.  I think if you're actually a "whole-size" shoe fit normally, these could be really great for you.  They are definitely zero-drop and have an awesome tread on the bottom.That being said, $90 is WAYY too much to charge for what you get here, regardless.  This Xero guy has made a fortune convincing everyone his $30 sandals are worth $90.  It's nuts.
The sandal needs to have curve edge to hold the feet better in place.

评论概述: Design cuts into my foot or toes
评论详情: The design at the front prevents my toes from spreading out (unlike the other Xero shoes I have) and I keep cutting my pinky toe or the outside of my foot on the outer plastic part depending on different adjustments.  I haven't found a "safe" adjustment yet.

I did purchase a Men size shoe that corresponded with my woman's size as that size in the men's was a bit cheaper, and I had already tried a different brand of barefoot, minimalist sandal that was very expensive that I had strap issue with. This is a great sandal! I did modify the strap across the top a bit as I wasn't used to having a strap so far up on the top of my foot at the ankle. I have bunions and this is a good summer shoe for that. The sole is very sturdy and grippy on the bottom and my feet do not slide at all in the sandal. I wear them to work in a casual office, in the garden, mowing, walking, and moderate hiking. I probably would not wear them to Church. I did not post a picture because my feet are a bit narly. ALSO: I do want to say that once you go with barefoot style shoes, it is almost impossible to go back. And be aware that not all barefoot style shoes have a wide toe box. It depends on the brand.
Put 'em on and hike away!

These are amazing casual use, minimalist sandals. They have enough mass to protect my feet somewhat and give me confidence on rough rocks and even backpacking trails. I haven't noticed any issues with the grip.  Like lots of rubbery materials though, the sole rubs off on the feet after many days of continuous use. Maybe it's also an age thing. The soft tread on part of the sole vanishes quickly, and the lug depths are shallow to begin with.

评论概述: My feet are stronger than ever.
评论详情: I wish I had a better picture of my first day in this shoe, but it's pretty evident how my feet improved, not only in feeling but also visually. Feeling: - I feel more balanced overall because I use my whole foot vertically and horizontally. The first time I rode a bike with this and put a foot on the ground, my brain was, "Oh, that feels different." Since then, I've been on a journey of feeling new sensations and strength in my feet. - My toes are stronger and more active in the step.  Visually: - My feet look like they went to the gym, lol - Big toes are straight  Overall, I would 100% recommend these shoes. Make sure to size your feet and follow the sizing recommendation; it's definitely an investment in your health! The left picture is day one with barefoot shoes, and the right one is 5 months later. Thanks for reading!

These sandals are incredibly comfortable, although I noticed one strap is longer than the other - a minor quirk for someone like me. However, I was disappointed when the first strap on the right foot started to come apart right next to the big toe area, despite the advertised 5000-mile warranty. It's concerning to see the sole detaching so early on, making me doubt it'll even last 1000 miles (since I don't walk much).  For everyday wear, they're great - true to their zero-drop design and perfect for hot climates (above 90°F). This is actually my second pair; the first ones were for my wife, and those have held up exceptionally well.

评论概述: Initial review. Will update if durability doesn't prove itself to match the price.
评论详情: I purchased these after seeing them pop up on multiple outdoors sites, recommending them for use as ultralight camp shoes for backpacking.  We had a chance to test them out on a 30 mile hike last October and I am satisfied with my purchase. They are extremely light which helps to keep my load weight down, but gives me something to wear around camp and let my feet air out after being crammed in boots all day. The straps setup keeps them snugly attached to your feet which also lend to them being used as steam crossing shoes if the water is too deep for your boots.  As far as the 0 Drop hype goes - I don't know whether it is a good thing or not, but you can definitely feel it. Its about as close to barefoot as I have ever felt while still wearing shoes. A little weird at first, but I found them quite comfortable trudging around camp at night.  My only complaint would be that the strap setup makes them a little fidgety to put on. Putting them on when nature called in the middle of the night was a little challenging - Especially being that everything on my body was super-sore on that trip. I feel like this could be improved by adding an additional buckle or maybe changing the strap design a little, but I'm nitpicking here.  They are however expensive, so if they fall apart before I feel like I've gotten my monies worth out of them and Xero doesn't live up to their warranty, the rating will be adjusted accordingly.

It’s a great shoe as far as comfort but the sole has already come apart! This was the second pair and the first one took 4 yrs for the sole to come apart! These shoes were purchase in July 2023 and not worn right away…it is now March 24 and the super glue is out and the sole is being reattached. For the price I expect more!

评论概述: It takes time to get used to them!
评论详情: It took me several weeks to really get used to these but my feet have never felt better.

评论概述: Will Never Run In Closed Toes Shoes Again!
评论详情: I went on a 10 mile trail run in these and it felt so good to feel like I was running barefoot. They fit perfect, there were no hot spots with the straps rubbing on skin, and it almost felt effortless to run. I am truly a convert, and will never run in closed toed shoes again. This is what we should all be wearing when we're moving on our feet. I can't wait to get more use out of these. I will update the review as far as the durability over time, but so far, they're amazing.

So I have had these for about 5 months now, and I really didn't know what to expect from this type of footwear.  I have wanted to go minimal for a while,  but I didn't know where to start.  At first,  I didn't realize the impact of wearing the "traditional" shoes were having on my feet.  Early last year we visited multiple amusement parks and I remember having pain in my feet from a full day of walking and standing in lines no matter what shoes I wore, from my Nike's to my Sanuk's it didn't matter.  After purchasing these sandals, I have worn these to multiple amusement parks, Zion and around Las Vegas and I couldn't tell you just how much of a difference I feel with my feet at the end of the days. The adjustment period wasn't bad or long, I'd say about 3 to 4 weeks. If you're considering these, I'd have to say this is the most comfortable pair of footwear I own.
Very comfortable I just got my husband his second pair because he wore out his first they are AWESOME!!! Highly recommend!

评论概述: Almost like not having sandals on...
评论详情: These sandals are a perfect blend of style and comfort. The ergonomic design provides excellent support, making them ideal for long walks, but less suited for jungle hikes. With a trendy look and quality materials, these sandals combine fashion and functionality, making them perfect for urban backpackers. I do say that over long periods of time I did start getting blisters, but it was after like 15 miles.

评论概述: ZERO shock absorption -- brutal, in fact
评论详情: While as attractive and well-made as any Xeros I own, these sandals offer NO shock absorption whatsoever.  Ever step is a heel-pounding hellscape.  Could not get them off quick enough. They will be returned tomorrow.  What the hell, Xero?
Super comfy but needs Velcro to fasten straps Hard to adjust & put on because there’s no Velcro

$80 for made in china rubber with dinky little straps. Insane. Do not buy. You're better off making your own shoes or buying a reputable brand of zero-drop sandals made with actual high-quality materials. This company is just creating landfill waste with a green-washed-all-natural image
Compact and easy to pack. Comfortable and pads feet against rocky shores  and woodland roots. Showing wear on toe section after one use.

No issue with the quality or vendor. The design simply isn’t to my liking. I love the sandals when on a flat surface or up hill. However, I got caught in a rain storm on a downhill trail and my foot slid horribly!  Tossed em away after that.

评论概述: Lightweight but durability is an issue
评论详情: Mine broke after just 2 months of normal usage. The rubber attached to the sole snapped off and I had to walk shoeless for a while which ruined the whole day, as I had to find a shop near by and buy something to wear. I understand it is supposed to be lightweight but there are definitely durability issues with this current design. It's a shame because I did like the product but I will not try it again with the high price point. I would rather wear something a bit heavier but lasts ALOT longer, like my Tevas.
Kinda hard to get use to.  You feel everything you walk on.  Very thin!

I have Teva’s, Chaco’s and others. They all have a place and time I wear them them, but these are my favorite. The strap material is much softer, and I love the minimal, barefoot feel. Light weight for camp shoes or the occasional wet wade when hiking. Love these shoes.

Grabbed these because I needed something water-safe with a back strap, and absolutely love them.  They also weigh practically nothing and take up almost no space in a bag.  When can we get flip-flops like this?My one qualm is that the design makes it slightly more challenging to get your feet in and out quickly, versus something with Velcro or other fasteners.  But, by the same token, they’re not going anywhere once they’re adjusted properly.  It makes sense, though, considering the design goals of minimalism and light weight.They’re definitely a different experience from thicker sandals with more cushion and support.  The “barefoot” term is accurate - it feels like you’re wearing nothing.  But there’s still some minimal shock absorption, and the grip is very good.  You feel more “in control” then you do with thicker sandals.

Been looking for some good walking/hiking sandals and not easy even though so many out there. Light and flexible yet firm and supportive. The contact with strap feels great, no rub points and super secure. Be sure to start with a looser strap fit on front of foot as it helps with comfort feeling. I don’t remember what I paid for them but will buy more. The surface feel is something new as never really experienced that with my other footwear. Gona try some light hiking and running soon.  Great product.

I like the sandals a lot. They fit well and are comfortable.  Until they get wet.  When wet they become slippery as grease against the bottom of your feet which makes them really difficult to walk in which is a problem.  Otherwise they seem to be well made and should last a long time.  Just don’t get them wet!
I teach gentle fitness classes and have been teaching in my Zero sandals and they are fantastic!!!!! It's as if I'm almost barefoot.

评论概述: Hard to Believe your Not Barefoot
评论详情: I've been a full time barefooter for 10 years.  I read some articles about zero drop barefoot sandals and decided to give them a go. After 2 weeks research I decided to try the Xero Z trail, especially since they backed their product enough to offer a 7 day trial period. I got them in, easily adjusted them to my feet and hit the trail. I immediately feel in love with them. I kept looking at my feet to ensure I actually had sandals on. They  are that light and comfortable!  The open toe design enhances the barefoot feel with no strap between your toes. I thought the front toe area might catch on rocks or roots on the trail but with a proper snug strap adjustment,  there's No issue. During the trail period I took the Zs to water. They did great with the only exception was if water is between the skin of the feet and sandal bed. It Can be Sleppery!  Did not like that part. However,  they dry quickly. Overall I was so impressed that I ordered a pair for my wife. She loves them as well. A suggestion I found to imprint your foot into the foot bed is to shower in them a time or two. After doing this you could clearly see and feel the glove like comfort. My only concern is durability. I read reviews with strap issues including the backstrap velcro. During the trial period I called Xero customer service. They eased my mind when they assured me if that should happen,  the sandals were covered with a 24 month warranty on the straps and a lifetime warranty on the soles. Therefore,  if you enjoy being barefoot and grounding but with a little protection,  I HIGHLY  recommend these Xero sandals!

评论概述: Pay more for a better quality sandal
评论详情: As a big proponent of zero drop shoes, as well as quality light weight sandals (wear active sandals about 90% of the time I’m outside of my house), I bought these hoping they’d live up to my expectations. They did not. The quality/material felt like a sandal you’d get at a beach side gift shop. I imagine these would have broke a few weeks into owning them. So I returned them (hence the 3 star - can’t say for sure, but assuming my gut is right).  If you’re looking for a quality, active, zero drop sandal, spend more and get something like the Bedrock cairn (or cairn pro) sandals. You’ll spend ~$30 USD more, but you’ll get a sandal that will keep up with about anything you can throw at it, is lightweight, zero drop, and super quality.  The quality is just not in this sandal.

评论概述: Do not ship in manufacturer's packaging only
评论详情: I was looking forward to trying out these sandals while on vacation. They were due to be delivered the day we were leaving... perfect, except only one sandal was in the package. Xero apparently uses non-plastic bags to package their products, which I appreciate. But the material is flimsy, or the adhesive used to seal the non-plastic together doesn't really stick.  Bottom line, I only received one sandal; if you order these on Amazon, make sure it is shipped inside another box.

I got these sandals for hiking. The fit and style seem really good but the material quality just feels really shockingly sub-par, especially for the price. More than half of the bottom sole (the light parts) is not rubber, but a sort of fabric/foam like material that feels like it would have no traction and wear away in no time at all. The top of the foot bed came with scratches already visible in it, and has no texture for traction. The part that connects the straps to the foot bed are some kind of fabric material that feels like it would wear and rip easily (and apparently does, seeing other reviews on here). Sadly, they're going back.
I really like the shoes and had no issues with returning for a larger pair after wearing for a at.

评论概述: Broke the first time I used them
评论详情: A short rock hopping excursion at the river and these sandals broke. There's a weak link at the neoprene material at the ankle. Don't buy these if you do more than walk around.
Second pair. Love them so much.

Sad to see that xero is still using poor quality Velcro when it is necessary to hold the sandals on your foot. The Velcro on my previous pair failed. I was under the impression that they had improved. When I received my new pair I was highly disappointed to see the same cheap Velcro on these.
thank you, great speed and service
They are everything and more. Once you put them on it’s like I’ve already been wearing them for months. This is the third product I’ve gotten from this seller. All of them five stars.

These are my first barefoot style sandals and they are incredibly comfortable. I couldn’t be happier with them. I haven’t worn them in rough terrain yet, but for normal wear around town, I’ve walked on them for long periods comfortably without issue. Love these!

According to my bride, it is the best sandal ever. She uses it on her trail hikes. She’s had others that when they got wet, they would slip off underwater and turn sideways. These sandals grip your foot, so they won’t slide off when you’re walking across a creek or small river.
At first these were super comfortable, but after a month the footpad was already wearing out and gave me a blister.  Also the straps are too long making them not as sleek as they could be.

评论概述: Just what I was looking for!
评论详情: Replaced my Chaco’s with these and couldn’t be happier😎took me a few weeks to dial in the fit…but now there perf✌🏽

评论概述: Great sandals for every day use.
评论详情: First of all, my experience with this sandals is not very long (one week). Previous week I received and did one not usual thing (usualy befor long trip test before use). I open package and use sandals to may trip: river boat, wood hiking and in river, after that I use with bicycle. The weather was: from +10C to +25C, the ground: wood, sand, river stones, asphalt. To summ up: 1. light and comfortable. 2. in the woods (not like jungle) was comfortable. 3. litle bit hard move legs when all was around mud. clean and then wear again. 4. Foot conection with sandal litle bit slippery when inside sand and mud. 5. With bicycle need to be litle bit cautious - bicause metal pedals leave scratch in sole (in not so strong part.) 6. Use in industrial place - streets with asphalt - exelent. 7. I will use in some sport activities (runing,...) - result will be. Conclusion: At the moment I am happy with this product.

评论概述: Not for wide feet, makes bunions worse
评论详情: Seems like a good design. Except that the features of this sandal actually squeeze the toes together, making a perfect situation for creating painful bunions. Also footbed is too narrow for a “relaxed fit” for toes.
I love love love these sandals, so it hurts me to give anything less than 5 stars, but after 2 months the sole is delaminating long before the tread is wearing out.

评论概述: Perfect for hiking the Grand Canyon, not so great if you’re going in water
评论详情: Bought these for several hiking trips through Arizona. These held up, with utmost comfort through the Grand Canyon, on hot pavement through native ruins, and along rough Arizona desert. However, went to a river and then attempted to do a mild hike back and the inside of the shoes were incredibly slippery. They were easy to dry, but I had such high hopes to be able to just keep going after the River. Otherwise these are solid shoes. I have wide feet and they’re so comfortable, grip all types of ground great. No foot pain.
Thin and light weight, didn’t feel like they would be durable and at the price I expected a lot more so I returned them.

The size was right on and the sandals are comfortable. I did some uphill trail running in them. The soles are thin and lightweight. My only issue is that the soles are very thin and I do not expect them to last very long. The company says they are good for 5000 miles, and I hope that is true.

I was initially worried since some of the reviews here indicated problems. I have been using the sandals for two weeks on my usual routines and they have been durable so far. No problems. They are thick enough for most terrains especially rocky ones but still allow feedback where I can feel the bumps on the ground. They are very comfortable, the straps do not sink into the skin nor cause rashes. I hope the ankle straps maintain their stickiness for a long time. Regarding the weight, it is indeed as advertised. You barely feel them on your feet! I am size US 8.5 and the size 8 fits perfectly.

A minimalist sandal that I could effectively where when backpacking (or rucking as the crowd calls it now).  In 2 long treks (6+ miles) they were comfortable, thin sole and stayed properly attached. Loved the feel.  Too early to rate them on durability, but no obvious issues.  One note. I did need to carefully adjust the straps (particularly the toe strap) to insure proper fit. This is a one time adjustment though. After initial adjustment just need to fasten the back strap every time I put them on.

评论概述: Material of toe strap needs to be less rough.
评论详情: The sandals feel nice overall on the feet, but the material used is too rough for the tops of my toes, which are not overly sensitive. Walking in them with a snug fit (which is necessary for a sandal) causes the strap to run on the top of my big toe in particular, which I fear will cause blisters. I do not want to loosen the straps any more because then the sandals will wobble when I walk nor do I want to wear band aids on my toes all the time. The material over the toes needs to be softer. For my pair one of the straps was put on upside down, which probably is not common but did not inspire a lot of confidence.

评论概述: Great Product, Even Better Company. Solved my Foot Pain
评论详情: I have owned a pair of the Ztrail sandals since 2018. Xeros offered me two separate warrantied exchanges that i failed to send in my sandals for because I liked wearing them so much that I just repaired them myself. Even with their kind offer of a warranty I wanted to buy another pair and support their business. 5+yrs and well over 5,000 miles strong!

评论概述: Good design. Durability could be better.
评论详情: Pros: I like the way they feel. It took me a few wears to break into them, but I like that I can have a sandal that is close to walking on flat ground. Unlike flip-flops or slip-ons these sandals strap to my feet well enough for me to drive my manual transmission car. Heel-toe rev matching and all. I like how they look. They are not overly bulky like many sandals are. I usually wear a mens size 10, but I got size 8 because I wanted them to be snug with the edges of my feet pretty much aligned with the edges of the sandals.  Cons: The first time I used these sandals it was for a 2 mile walk on pavement. My feet got very hot (burning hot) at the friction points and i had to put my feet in front of a sprinkler. Because of this I use my sandals for activities where I'm not constantly walking (eg. going to the store). They were also painful to wear initially, but after I put forth some effort to dial-in the tightness, I don't think about them much when I'm wearing them. The pictured sandals were purchased 2 months ago. The insoles of my wife's sandals (green/grey) already started to show wear less than 2 weeks after purchasing. She does like them, however, and uses them more than I do (eg for walks and short hikes). I am worried that the rubber piece next to the pinky toe will break off, but I can see how they had to compromise to create this minimalist sandal. Also maybe I just haven't figured it out yet, but they take a minute to get on and off.  Bottom line: I love what Xero Shoes is trying to achieve and at this point a can say that I would buy Xero Shoes again because I like they're design and I am hopeful that they will work on durability for subsequent models.
This product is supposed to be ultralight however it's almost as heavy as my slides and 4 times the cost.

评论概述: Perfect Fit For My Wide Feet
评论详情: I love these. I have wide feet and usually have to buy a couple of sizes too big to get them wide enough. These fit perfectly. They are comfortable, look great, and I love the thin soles that let me feel the ground.  UPDATE: After reading some of the other reviews and having worn my sandals a little longer, I wanted to add that I find them very easy to take on and offf, easy to adjust, and they have great grip on trails. After additional use, I like them even more.
Light enough to place in backpack and wearin camp or keep in car for when you want to get out of your boots.

评论概述: It's broke, after using them 3 times only!
评论详情: They are very slippery on the inside of the sandals (the part that you foot is about it) no good for long walks. It's got broken after the 3 time I used it for walking. Very disappointed

I got some targeted ads on Instagram for barefoot shoes and I looked up different brands and settled on Zero. I needed some sandals so I bought these ones. I don't know if actual shoes or boots are any different, but at least the sandals were pretty awful, especially considering the pricetag.  They look and feel flimsy. Like half a floor mat with some strings on it. The don't feel good to walk in or to put on. The soles offer your feet almost no protection whatsoever. Honestly if you want that barefoot feeling in a sandal-wearing scenario, you should just go barefoot for all these sandals do.
These Men sandals are comfortable. They are lightweight. Easy to strap on and remove.

I tried these with Amazon's Prime Wardrobe. I was glad to have purchased a women's and mens style in these. I'm a 9 in women's and I ordered a 7 in mens, the mens ended up being too small but that was fine because I just ordered a size bigger to fit the way I wanted. I actually prefer the mens to the women's due to the straps on the mens being slightly wider in style. I have very long, narrow feet and the mens still fit wonderfully. I love the way these fit, how light they feel and they are exactly what I'm looking for in a zero drop, barefoot, minimalist shoe. The price point is fair compared to other "barefoot" shoes/sandals (granted we all wish things were cheaper haha). I really liked the black compared to the beige "tree design" that I ordered in the women's.  All in all, I can't wait to get more and wear them this summer!

评论概述: Poor design, constant needs tightening and rubs my toe
评论详情: These are lightweight and great for walking on soft surfaces but they need constant tightening, getting them on and off is a little annoying compared to normal sandals, and worse of all the plastic clip on the front rubs my toe to the point of bleeding if I put in any kind of mileage with these  Wearing socks with then makes the rubbing less annoying but I haven't worn these in months and went back to my Columbia sandals for daily walks

Easy to adjust & wear. True to size for me. Fantastic feel while walking…love them. Only drawback (hence, the 4 stars) - the little loop that holds the excess strap in place on top of the sandal broke right off on first use. It’s pretty flimsy. Thankfully I had watch loops (from my extra Garmin bands) I could use & they were more sturdy. No problems now.

I bought these shoes back in April and the plastic snapped this fall, rendering the shoe unusable. I appreciated how light these shoes were and how close to barefoot it felt. However, I found I had to adjust the straps very often and the shoes would get dirty very fast given the material of the sole. The shoes are comfortable but definitely not safe to wear for running or walking long distances of hard surfaces. I walked for a day in the city on them (concrete) and my ankles were extremely sore the next day. Mostly, I am disappointed with the durability of the shoes - the strap plastic thing getting torn and the outsole being worn down. These should not be advertised as 'guaranteed for 5k miles' when they cant even last a year. Part of my outsoles is completely worn down. Luckily there is a 24 month warranty.
The most comfortable sandal I've ever worn. Quality materials.

Overpriced and not what I thought they’d be. Not quick to put on, and I’m not a fan of the single adjustable strap that goes from the toes to the top of the foot. Separate Velcro on either area would have been better, in my opinion. Not wide enough either…had to to size up but it didn’t pan out well. My feel are used to the barefoot concept but the straps, width, etc., are just not for me. Stuck with these, out a pretty penny and will eventually have to find something else. Glad it’s winter for now.

I got these because I've had Xero shoes before and i loved them. I currently live in an environment where I can wear sandals all year round, so I wanted the minimalist type. So far these things are amazing. They are extremely lightweight, but they keep me from feeling the sharp things while walking on the dirt roads. They're comfortable enough if you are used to minimalist footwear...for me its been a while, so i need to get used to it again. But so far so good... I wear a 10.5 so i ordered an 11. They fit just fine.  Update: after a few weeks of daily wear, one of the straps broke on the inside of the sandal. I was able to get repaired by a local shoe repair man and so far that repair is holding up. The repair man beefed up the attach points so I hope they hold together. I still do really love these shoes

My feet feel healthier and stronger then ever after wearing these and other barefoot shoes. 9/10, -1 because these do horribly if and mud gets between your foot and sandal. Other than that I love these!

I usually wear a 13-- should I have gotten a 12? It rubbed by my toe and gave me a blister on my first walk with them! They are really light weight! Comfortable as zero drop goes! Just not sure if these are "normal" kinks to be worked out. Sometimes new flip flops take a couple of wearings to adjust to our feet. Hoping that's what will happen with these!

So the order I purchased through Amazon I was actually sent the wrong size. I ordered directly through Xero and I love these sandals! They’re very comfortable, super lightweight and have become just an everyday sandal to me; not to mention would perform well on trails from what I can tell. I highly recommend these!

评论概述: Perfect barefoot sandals, good for one season
评论详情: I wanted a barefoot sandal for summer. I wanted something without padding or arches- they hurt my feet. I also wanted something to hike in, the soles of Tevas and Keens hurt my feet. I read the reviews and decided to give them a try. From the moment I out them on I was in love, exactly what I wanted. 1st know the bottoms are thin, it will be like walking without a shoe- so if its a rocky terrain you will feel it. You foot will also feel the hard concrete so make sure thats want you want. 2nd I agree with other reviews the durability is not there. By the end of the summer season the inside of the sandal was worn down and gone. For the money I would have liked to get two seasons, but they were worn almost daily. I will consider another pair next year.
Standing the sandal fits. Once you start walking your foot slides forward over the front, no mater how much you tighten the straps
Xero has always been well designed footwear, but the quality has remained about the same. Even if the price has to increase slightly, please put more quality materials into the products.
This is my second pair of Xero sandles.  These are better than the previous style.
Very comfy my wife does think they look feminine on my hobbit feet… but I just don’t care what other think about foot wear.
Very comfortable and convenient 🥇👌
Buy em, just do it

评论概述: Most comfortable things I’ve ever had on my feet.
评论详情: Perfect for any all outdoor activities from hikes to wading in the river. Perfect fit and they look good too.

评论概述: Very comfortable but don't stand up
评论详情: Very comfortable but tread is wearing and coming away from sole of the Sandle

I had no problem with anything breaking. Walked about 30 miles over 10 days on cobble stones, pavement and dirt roads. I'm 185lbs, size 11, flat flat feet. Loved the sandals. I wish they made a leather version. You'll feel all the rocks and stones so be careful what you step on. They are so so light.

These are great, seem pretty sturdy for minimalist, the tread provides great traction, an issue I've had with other minimalist footwear. Fit is just right. I have some miles on them and they seem to be holding up well. Definitely will buy more in the future.

I took these on a 10 day trip where these sandals were my only footwear. Heals hurt a lot despite the product listing stating that they were comfortable.  I like the way they fit though.  The heal cup could be bigger to prevent pebbles from getting in
